p: The antifungal activity of CMEO on F. graminearum was determined by the micro-well dilution method, and MIC and MFC values were observed at 421.7 ± 27.14 ppm and 618.3 ± 79.35 ppm, respectively. Furthermore, the antifungal mechanism of CMEO on F. graminearum was assessed by determining the ROS, lipid peroxidation, ergosterol, and micro-morphology of macroconidia.
